Invocation Name: my acurite
des:
Know Your Environment.
Your AcuRite weather station and compatible devices now work together with Amazon Alexa to help you stay up-to-date on the current conditions of the places you care about most. 

Each AcuRite device monitors conditions that impact the health of your home or business. From indoor comfort to leak detection to the weather right in your own backyard, AcuRite devices make it easy to Plan Your Day with Confidence.

Compatible devices require AcuRite Access to connect to My AcuRite and work with Alexa.

Alexa is ready to provide you with a report of your current weather, humidity in the baby's room and more (available measurements depend on AcuRite device):
• Indoor and Outdoor Temperature
• Indoor and Outdoor Humidity
• Outdoor Wind Speed
• Outdoor Wind Direction
• Lightning Detection
• Rainfall Totals
• Pressure

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button and then link your my AcuRite account to Alexa. 

If you have multiple devices on your My AcuRite account, simply say "Alexa, ask My AcuRite to list my devices" and Alexa will report conditions on your first device then ask if you want to hear another device. Alexa will report conditions from up to seven (7) devices connected to My AcuRite.
